title: FS: longish list of HOF and SL all SGC graded, mostly lower grades
author: trobba

posts.post_title: FS: longish list of HOF and SL all SGC graded, mostly lower grades
posts.post_content:
Following list is for sale: check, MO or paypal gift please.

Can send scans via email, as I am still working on them.

"I will take it" takes precedence over scan requests or other inquiries...many cards present much nicer than the technical grade. Backs standard unless noted.

Email only for communications

thanks - Rob
[url]rgutheil@gmail.com[/url]

HOFers:

Bresnahan, bat 30 - $70
Cobb, green port 20 - $1050 
Jennings, one hand, Old Mill 35 - $150
Keeler, port 30 - $170
Mcginnity 55 - $200
Speaker 20 - $210
Young, port, 20 - $355  SOLD

SLers:

Cranston 40 - $100  SOLD
Greminger 20 - $55  
Lentz 20 - $40
Lipe 30 Old Mill - $70
Manion 30 Old Mill - $80
Orth 40 - $95 SOLD
Paige 30 - $75
Rockenfeld 20 - $45
Shag, 30 Old Mill - $145  SOLD
C Smith 40 - $110
Westlake 35 - $80
White 20 Old Mill - $45
Are any of the polar bears graded?

[quote name="kamikidEFFL" post=1209919]Are any of the polar bears graded?[/QUOTE]

The numbers with the cards are the grades. 

Baker 20 Polar Bear - $55 = SGC 20
Crawford, bat Polar Bear 30 - $75 = SGC 30
Joss, pitch Polar Bear 20 - $60 = SGC 20
still plenty of cards remain, email for scans, Green Cobb added
Got the Jordan. Very pleased, good value, prompt shipping. Thanks!
sold cards removed, longish list down to medium, e-mail for scans...
